01
Practicum on Psychiatric Nursing
本實習課程旨在協助學生應用壓力適應模式與精神衛生護理相關理論，提供個案精神衛生之基本照顧活動與服務，含：建立治療性人際關係，進行整體性護理評估，提供精神衛生照顧與護理指導，探索精神衛生護理人員的角色與功能、認識與精神衛生治療相關的模式、法律知識、社區資源，進而體會到精神衛生對個人健康的重要性，並展現自我覺察、自治、自學的態度。
The purpose of this course is to cultivate the student an individual Psychiatric nursing ability. This course emphasis on that the students apply their psychiatric nursing knowledge and nursing skill in the clinical psychiatric nursing situation. The students are expected to experience the process of the therapeutic nurse- patient relationship, realize the therapeutic use of self, help client to develop a positive self-concept and corrective relationship、view and emulate the role and function of the psychiatric nurse.
第4~18週

01
Psychiatric Nursing and Practice
本課程旨在培養四年制學生具備執行精神衛生護理的關懷、溝通與合作與批判思考等基本能力。課程內容包括我國精神衛生有關的政策、法律、業務與推展現況、基本理念、常用的精神衛生照護模式及處置，並期許學生增進精神衛生護理知識、態度與技能。
This course provides nursing students with the basic knowledge and skills about psychiatric patient nursing care. The major elements include the policies, laws, regulations, theories and skills of advanced psychiatric mental health nursing, and missions of psychiatric nursing organizations. Students are required to identify and establish their own philosophy of nursing as well as to recognize psychiatric mental health nurse’s roles and functions. Nursing assessment, interventions and evaluation used by psychiatric clinicians are presented and discussed in this class.
第1~3週

01
Medical-Surgical Nursing Practicum  II
本實習課程主要是協助學生整合基礎醫學及內外科護理學I、II知識應用於臨床情境中。實習中學生能以護理專業知識為基礎，運用批判性思考及護理過程處理個案常見之健康問題，並判斷優先順序，擬定及執行個別性的護理措施，同時能提供個案及家屬所需的護理指導，並評值護理措施的成效。學生在實習過程中展現自我學習及參與醫療團隊的互動，藉以學習溝通合作能力，並分享其臨床實習之感受與角色適應。
This course aims to facilitate students to integrate knowledge learned in basic medicine courses and Medical and Surgical Nursing I and II in clinical situation. Students will be able to apply concepts of critical thinking and nursing process based on knowledge of nursing to identify health problems, design proper nursing activities and health education, and evaluate outcomes to clients with medical and surgical disorders. Observation activity in OR, recovery room or special exam rooms may be arranged if it can enhance students learning. Students also have opportunities to demonstrate self-directed learning, participate in interactions with medical team, and practice communication and cooperation abilities. Students are encouraged to share their feelings and role adaptation through the process of clinical practice.
第9~18週

Medical-Surgical Nursing and Practice II
本課程是以國人常見健康議題及現今內外科照護趨勢而設計，課程內容銜接內外科護理學與實作I，包括住院老人、癌症、傳染性疾病、急重症、燒傷等個案照護，學生能運用批判性思考進行整體性評估、辨識個案的健康問題、執行可行性護理措施於理論及實作課程中，以增進學生認識未來臨床護理實務發展趨勢。
This course extends contents from Medical-surgical Nursing Theory and Laboratory I with a consideration of current trends and topics in healthcare. With a core concept of nursing process, the course contents include topics related to medical-surgical nursing, assessment of physical, psychological, and social aspects of clients, critical thinking, and evidence based theories. Students will be able to apply course contents to identify health problems, design proper nursing activities, and evaluate outcomes of clients with medical and surgical disorders in nursing lab.
第1~8週

01
Technology and Life
以學生現有的數理、生物背景為基礎，引導學生進入科技應用的領域。現代科技進步快速，世界日新月異，學生需具備有敏銳之觀察力與學習能力，始能跟上時代之潮流。本課程將目前先進之科技作一概念性的介紹；涵蓋有太空科技、能源應用、材料科技、生物技術、資訊科技等內容，期能一窺世界之奧妙，進而引發學習新知之動機與興趣。
At the dawn of the twenty-first century today, as every citizen of the world should have a basic scientific concept and knowledge which can serve people to make the decisions, participate in civic and cultural affairs, and join economic production activities. Also, beside the professional expertise and technology, the most important thing for the citizens is to care about humanities, develop themselves actively, and benefit the people and serve the community.
The major purpose of this course is from the new technology of modern life to induced the students knowing the basic applied science and technique concept. From the simpler chemistry, physics and biologic technology, step by step , let students know more the world and more interesting about the new matters and new technology.
The studentswho finish this course will know the basic applied science and technology and more understanding about the world we lived.
全18週

01
Community Health Nursing Practicum
學生能於實習過程中進行家 庭的健康問題評估、分析影響因素並協助庭處理健康問題；能進行社區或群體評估並發現 社區或群體健康問題， 以期整合資源達到促進及維護個人、家庭團體和社區健康。
The practice of the community health nursing is designed to assistant the students to develop the ability of family health nursing including assessment, analysis, diagnosis, implementation and evaluation. Meanwhile, in the process of practice, students can make use of professional role and function to engage individual, family and community nursing care and discover the health problem, design the health plan, and evaluate the affection of health program. By integration the source of community, the practice of the community health nursing can improve the holistic health of person, family, group and community.

01
Community Health Nursing and Practice
本課程以社區為導向之社區衛生護理相關概念，以奠定學生從事社區衛生護理工作的基礎。透過實作練習共同參與、團體互動、增進彼此溝通，培養其社區健康評估的知識和技能，期望學生能向下紮根做好個案及家庭護理，向外能敏銳的發現團體及社區健康問題，以期整合社區資源，達到促進及維護個人、家庭、團體和社區之整體健康。
This course is designed to provide community health services based on the diverse perspectives. The course includes the theoretical framework of community health nursing, primary health care system, community health assessment, diagnosis and intervention, characteristic and health promotion of human developed stage, family assessment and nursing, chronic physical health problem, impact of culture to community health nursing, environmental influence on community health, and long term care. In the end of the course, students may provide integrated individual and family care and be aware of community health problems, and use the community resource to achieve community development.
第1~8週

Practicum for Obtaining Nursing Employment
本課程旨在培養學生整合並運用專業護理相關之知識與技能，於護理實務工作中，透過連續性且全時臨床護理實習，增加學生職場就業機會及提升工作適應能力，以奠定學生從事臨床護理工作的基礎。
The purpose of the course is to develop students’ clinical competence in hospital settings. Within the practicum, students will be trained to integrate and apply nursing theories, related knowledge, and skills in daily nursing practice. The training contents include practicing nursing routings, writing nursing records, familiar with nursing staff job descriptions, and participating in managing emergency situations. Students are expected to provide evidence-based, individualized, and prioritized nursing care based on assessment. Students will also be trained to communicate and cooperate with other medical team members, and to provide patients and their families health education and consultation. Students are also encouraged to actively participating in clinical and ethical issue discussions.
第1~7週

Mental Health and living: Healing factors that students should know
本課程為高中與大學間的銜間課程，對於以培養生死關懷與健康心理諮商之科系宗旨，技高端並無與本系對應的科系，且本系為國內少有之特色科系。為培養進入本系之新鮮人能對本系有認同感，能從108課網的素養教育，到具有科系特色之專業學習，產生學習遷移之效果，故從專業發展、團體歷程學習與癒花園場域服務，三個方向設計本課程，以培養大一新鮮人之專業認同與助人工作之能力。
This course is an articulative course between high school and university. For the purpose of the department to cultivate life and death care and health psychological coun-seling, there is no department corresponding to this department at the high school, and this department is a rare department in Taiwan. In order to cultivate new people who enter the department to have a sense of identity with the department, and from the literacy edu-cation of the 2019 Master Framework for the 12-year Basic Education Curriculum Guide-lines to the professional learning with the characteristics of the department, the instructor want to produce the effect of learning transfer among freshman. This course is designed from the professional development, group process learning and Healing Garden service. The purpose of this course is designed to cultivate the professional identity of freshmen and the ability to help others in their work.

Primary Application of Animal Assisted Therapy
本課程旨在建構學生參與專業動物輔助治療活動的基本知能。課程內容由動物輔助治療基本概念出發，帶領學生經歷個案評估、方案設計、與成果評值等方案規劃與執行的過程。並藉由課堂講授、討論、影片研討、實作體驗學習之活動，建構學生具備有動物輔助治療助理員能力。
This course is to establish students the basic abilities for attending animal assisted therapy activities. The contents include animal assisted therapy concepts, case assessment, program design, and evaluation. The teaching activities include lectures, group discussions, documentary films discussion, and on-site practice, etc. Students are expected to be initiated their knowledge and skills as animal assisted therapy assistants.

Human Development
本課程旨在促使學生理解家庭如何型塑自己的發展，進而可以擴展理解他人發展的視框,作為諮商輔導的基礎。內容包含生命週期、自我價值、生命力、家庭溝通模式、家庭規條、與人連結。
This course aims at facilitating students to realize how his experiences in family influence his development. Based on this awareness is to build the foundation to understand and connect the others. These themes include life cycle, self-esteem, Life force, patterns of communication, family rules, connection.
Through self-awareness of personality traits and ability to communicate, understand their strengths and limitations in relationships. At the same time between learning interpersonal skills through effective communication, in order to improve the self-limitation of interpersonal communication, to achieve the establishment of relationships of healthy goodness.

Psychology
本課程旨在協助學生透過心理學增加對人的內在心理的認識，而增進與人接觸的興趣。內容包含生物心理學、感覺、知覺、意識、學習、記憶、思考、動機、情緒、壓力與健康，以及人格與社會心理學。期待學生可以應用心理學概念於日常生活中。
This course aims at helping students to increase understanding inner psychological process and to become interested in connecting people. These themes include psychobiology, sensation, perception, consciousness, learning, memory, thinking, motivation, emotion, stress and health, personality, social psychology. Expecting students could utilize psychological concept into daily life.

Introduction to Life Education
生命教育主要是引導學生從觀察與分享對生、老、死之感受的過程中，體會生命的意義及存在的價值，進而培養尊重和珍惜生命的情懷。本課程透過討論，引導學生探討自我悅納、關心家庭、熱愛他人、尊重大自然及探索生命的意義，建立積極正向的人生觀，發現生命的幸福。
This course proposes students can think and reflect the issues on life , explore the meaning of life in thinking about man’s conditions in the life world, issues on destiny、love、knowledge、character、art、religion、dying and death etc. 
 The expectation of this course try to help students have positive recognition and attitude on life by way of many lectures and discussions.
全18週

Thanatology and Funeral
本課程旨在讓學生了解殯葬活動衍生生死的課題與觀點，包括認識相關的儀式與殯葬禮儀，其對個人及社會組織的影響。從生死學的實務與運用現況，從醫學、社會、宗教與倫理的觀點探討死亡歷程，本課程期使同學建立正向的生死觀，死亡一直都是禁忌，但是它卻是生命過程中的一部份。希望經由本課程深入淺出的安排，讓社會中的每個人能夠擁有生命尊嚴與死亡尊嚴。
This course proposes students can understand current research and application on life and death, explorate death trajectories from medical, social, religious and ethic perspections, recognize how death to affect personal behavior, ritual about death and its reflection on social organization. The expectation of this try to help students have positive recognition and attitude on death.

History of Artistic Culture
透過藝術文化的類型與不同的表現形式及中西方藝術的演進與賞析，瞭解藝術的理念、內涵與歷史演變，深入探討藝術與生命、美感與生活、藝術與文化等重要議題之意義。培養學生對藝術文化有基本的認識與高度的敏感度，提升審美素養，持續自主學習的興趣。
Through the exploration of various types and form of art and culture, as well as the evolution and appreciation of Eastern and Western art, this course provides an understanding of the concepts, meaning and historical transformations of arts. It further delves deeply into significant topics such as art and life, aesthetics and everyday life, and art and culture. Students will acquire a foundational comprehension and heightened sensitivity of art and culture, enhance their aesthetic literacy, and foster a sustained commitment to self-directed education.

people and teamwork attitude.

Funeral policy and laws
「殯葬政策與法規」內容涵蓋殯葬政策與殯葬法規之探討分析，由於政策是法律條文設計之指導，殯葬政策部分主要在探討過去不同時期，政府為實現殯葬行政管理目的所採行的公共政策，至於現行政策規劃與法律條文設計是本學科最主要之內容，以引發學生學習動機及提升學習效果

Funeral Facilities
本課程介紹台灣殯葬管理條例規範的殯葬設施與殯儀館，協助學生認識國內外殯葬的各種設施、殯葬設施的管理維護、殯葬設施規劃與改變。透過議題中心教學法教導學生從殯儀館、火化場、公墓...等設施，來了解在進行完善的殯葬服務時所會使用之殯葬週邊設施，使了解其在殯葬服務的重要性及藉以來圓滿人生最後階段的需求。除經由介紹各項設施設備的名稱與沿革外，並邀請公部門及私部門講師授課教導現今殯葬設施之管理現況與未來規劃及發展、了解殯葬設施成為鄰避衝突的因素，並透過專家與地方菁英代表的訪談或是座談會，讓學生學習殯葬設施設置造成鄰避衝突的因素、化解衝突過程以及可能的解決方法。並配合本校iLMS行動學習進行網路的資料上傳、討論與分享。
This course introduces Taiwan's funeral regulations norms funeral facilities, funeral home and abroad to help students understand the various facilities, facilities maintenance management funeral, funeral planning and changing. Teachers use iLMS learning platform for uploading network data, discuss and share opinion.

Vocational Rehabilitation Services
本課程旨在建立學生對職業重建服務的基本理念，促進了解職業重建服務人員應注意遵守之專業倫理與職業重建服務之各項服務資源現況，並	學習身心障礙者就業與職涯輔導，以及擔任身心障礙者就業服務員的服務內涵與服務歷程，進一步學習以工作分析與職務再設計、職場支持與輔導。因而建立職業重建的概念與身心障礙者職業重建服務內涵，培養擔任職業重建服務專業人員之核心知能，並學習應用諮商輔導相關知能於職業重建服務過程，最後能綜合所學發展自身對職業重建服務領域的專業認同與職涯選擇。
This course of introduction to Vocational Rehabilitation Services aims to establish students’ basic concept of vocational rehabilitation services, promote the understanding of professional ethics and vocational rehabilitation services resources. The professionals of vocational rehabilitation services should pay attention to, and learn about employment and career counseling for the disabled. The service connotation and service process of employment attendants for the physically and mentally disabled will be further studied by job analysis and job redesign, workplace support and guidance. Therefore, we establish the concept of vocational rehabilitation and the connotation of vocational rehabilitation services for the physically and mentally handicapped, cultivate the core knowledge to serve as vocational rehabilitation services professionals, and learn to apply the relevant knowledge of counseling and counseling in the career reconstruction service process. Starting from understanding the International Classification of Functional, Disability, and Health (ICF), impact of impairment, career development of people with disabilities, and vocational rehabilitation services. The students will learn intake interview, design a vocational rehabilitation plan, and implement services, and job analysis skills. Through the process, students will be more capable vocational rehabilitation professionals. Finally integrate what they have learned to develop their own career to be the professionals of vocational rehabilitation services. Promote their Professional identity and career choice in the service field.
全18週

本課程旨在使學生能釐清對殯葬產業的認識與觀念，具備基本管理學知識，了解殯葬管理之範疇、沿革、專業知識與行政概念認知，進而應用課程內容剖析殯葬產業之經營管理生態與潛在問題等議題。因此，在教師督導協助下，學生要能針對殯葬管理議題擬定問題解讀、分析、研判與立論等書面架構，並透過相關殯葬從業之影片觀賞和企業機構之實際參訪觀摩及文獻資料的蒐集分析，協助滿足學習者的學習需求或解決學習上的問題。
After studying of the course, students will be able to have the knowledge about funeral management. Under the assistance of supervisors, students will learn to interpret funeral and interment’s subjects of debate.

PE- Modern dance
在舞蹈的領域中，現代舞強調「探索」與「醒思」這
兩項精神，人體的自我探索、人在時間與空間中的醒思，因此本課程著重於身體

human within time and space. Therefore, this course emphasizes on 
recognition and discovery of body operation, and the curricular goal stresses 
on the awareness and development of body competence through body 
activities. The course content is to explore the body experiences of 
cumulative learners by proper sequential practices.

01
The Introduction of Art Therapy
本課程主要在介紹藝術治療的理論與實務，並且針對藝術治療如何應用於各年齡層之個案群中，進行深入的探討和研究。本課程預計分為十四個單元講授，分別介紹藝術治療的簡史、藝術治療在歐美及台灣的發展、不同的藝術治療取向、「表達性治療連續系統」(ETC)和「媒材可變特性」(MDV) 理論，了解這些理論與表達性藝術治療技法間的關係，並且透過參與藝療活動，學習和體驗藝術治療的精神，同時探討藝術治療在悲傷輔導、創傷治療、情緒障礙和行為問題之個案上的臨床運用。此課程以﹙1﹚研究著作之研讀﹙2﹚相關簡報之呈現與討論（3）表達性藝療活動之參與（４）個別和團體研究報告等方式進行，提供學生思考空間，並作為檢驗學習效果之參考。
Through the literature review, case studies and experiential art activities, this course will assist students in understanding the theories and practices in art therapy, as well as the connection between the arts and human life while gaining knowledge on how art can be used in the field of psychotherapy, life/death education, and grief counseling as a helpful tool to maintain one’s physical and mental health.
全18週

01
Logotherapy
幫助學生瞭解生命意義與身心靈健康的密切關係，從意義治療學的角度切入，探討安頓生命的道理，引導學生思考並實踐攸關個人成長及身心靈健康的重要課題。
The therapeutic component of Logotherapy follows the Judeo-Christian traditions, being open to anyone, and in this way ecumenical. In essence, Logotherapy aims at helping to find meaning and purpose in any life situation, actualizing the universal values set forth in the Ten Commandments and the Beatitudes. It is through finding meaning and purpose in suffering that healing and reconciliation can be attained and psychopathological symptoms can be relieved.

The Professional Competence and Skills of Funeral Director and practice
本課程從我國殯葬文書發展沿革於喪葬活動與司儀角色定位與功能相關論述，協助學生認識殯葬文書的規範與書寫，司儀禮生技巧等。本課程分為殯葬文書、殯葬司儀兩部分，課程內容概述如下：
一、殯葬文書：
  (一)介紹殯葬禮儀與文書的關係、古代殯葬文書的體類、當代殯葬文書的體類、訃文、碑文、銘文、祭文、輓聯等殯葬文書相關知能。。
  (二)訃聞語法書寫技巧
  (三)教導如何使用實用文書表格(治喪時程總表、作七時程表、出殯奠禮時程表、治喪人員分工表、出殯路線計車隊聯繫表)。
二、殯葬司儀：
  (一)介紹喪禮流程。 
  (二)殯葬司儀之專業技能，規劃奠禮流程並主持家奠及公奠禮應具備之專業知能。
  (三)覆旗暨民俗儀節。
Copy modern funeral instrument classes, make a practical instrument of modern funeral, funeral service the customs process, forward thinking on training, establish a correct sequence of funeral ideas, and professional skills training through the funeral ceremonies, give students a basic funeral knowledge and practice skills.

01
Philosophy and Life
「哲學與人生」是對「人的生命」所作的「哲學反省」。人，作為自然的、社會的、歷史的存在，在他所生活的世界中，面臨著繁複多樣、瞬息萬變的問題：處境、命運、愛情、知識、道德、藝術、宗教、臨終與死亡……其中有些問題事實上已經深深困擾著我們，另外一些則伺機突襲，在我們還來不及準備的時候，就被迫面對。生命的意義究竟是什麼？本課程嘗試以深入淺出的討論，藉由過去、當代人物的所感、所思，促進學習者進一步反省自我生命之種種。
Philosophy and Life is as a philosophical reflective thinking for the life.
Human beings, as natural, social and historical beings, face a great many complex varied and fast changing problems in the life-world, for example, love, destiny, knowledge, morality, art, religion, dying, and moreover the death so on.... Actually some of them have deeply perplexed us, while others watch for their chances to attack there would leave no time for covering our ears and we are merely compelled to confront with them. After all, what does Life mean?
Whereas this course tries to take up by the way a kind of discussion in explaining the profound in simple terms, and in making use of whatever in history, or the present age somebody's feeling and thinking, in order to promote the students to question themselves more about, and reflect further on all sorts of life-self.
全18週

本課程旨在讓學生了解醫療場域提供心理諮商的範疇，瞭解病患的遭受重大傷病的衝擊與影響，及其心理上如何啟動抗壓因應之機制；然後醫療場域提供心理諮商服務之實際運作狀況及其理論和方法之探討，進而培養學生面對醫療領域中各種健康問題衝擊而有心理壓力需求時，具備問題分析和諮商處遇能力，瞭解如何提供協助病患及其家屬提昇因應生病難題的適應力，也包括協助社區民眾心理健康促進以改善生活品質，也是擴大的醫療場域心理諮商服務範疇。
The course aims to enhance students’ knowledge of medical counseling. Students will be able to analyze the psychological problem of patients and make proper plans of counseling intervention. Furthermore, students will learn to assist patients to coping with the difficulties of chronic disease and assist people to promote their health and quality of life.

triumph.

Environmental Education
本課程旨在闡述環境永續發展的意義與重要性，教學內涵希望提昇學生永續發展的覺知，增加永續發展的概念知識，培養正確的永續發展態度與價值觀，並發展永續發展的行動技能與行動經驗。課程強調在環境中進行教育，學習有關環境的知識、態度、技能，並且為實踐永續環境而準備。環境教育包含六個核心的學習要素：自然資源保育概念、環境管理概念的融入；生態原理、互動與互賴概念的融入；以及融入環境倫理與永續性的概念等。
    課程內容涵蓋環境概論、環境倫理、環境教育法規、環境變遷與防災、節能減碳與能源管理、與永續發展與生態保育等主題內容。教學策略運用：做中學、在真實的情境中體驗、合作學習法、運用感官學習、探索環境議題等項目。教學方法採取課堂講解、分組討論、專題討論、現地參訪等方式進行，並以多媒體教材教學。期望藉由環境議題的認識與討論，深入環境的內涵；透過對於環境問題的觀察與思考，了解環境永續的本質及善盡環境保護的義務。環境教育是一種教育的過程，在過程中個人認識他們的環境，以及組成環境的生物、物理和文化間的交互作用，得到知識、技能和價值觀，並能個別或集體地了解並解決現在和將來的環境問題。
Environmental education is designed to explain the meaning and importance of environment and sustainable development. It refers to organized efforts to teach how natural environments function, and particularly, how human beings can manage behavior and ecosystems to live sustainably. It is a multi-disciplinary field integrating disciplines such as biology, chemistry, physics, ecology, earth science, atmospheric science, mathematics, and geography. The term often implies education within the school system, from primary to post-secondary. However, it sometimes includes all efforts to educate the public and other audiences, including print materials, websites, media campaigns, etc. 
  Environmental education consists of six core elements: the concept of conservation of natural resources, environmental management into ecological principles, into the concept of interaction and interdependence; and the concept of integration of environmental ethics and sustainable environment. Environmental education is the teaching of individuals, and communities, in transitioning to a society that is knowledgeable of the environment and its associated problems, aware of the solutions to these problems, and motivated to solve them.Environmental education is an educational process, in the process of personal awareness in their environment, and form an environment of interaction between biological, physical and cultural, are knowledge, skills, and values, and individually or collectively, can understand and solve current and future environmental problems.
全18週

Travel Industry Management
旅行業經營環境變革日漸劇烈，小而強的經營理念，求同存異的競爭策略及後電腦科技時代統合管理方式等思維，已蔚然成風，開創出旅行業管理的新境界。因此本課程之教學目的即在探討旅行業未來的經營管理方式，旅遊未來發展上，區域旅遊、國內旅遊、遊輪遊程之市場主導性，同時說明網際網路之行銷效應及全面品質管理之旅行業競爭策略等，以引導學生具備未來旅行業經營管理之知識。
This course aims at leading students to build up a better understanding of what a travel agency really is on the real world. The environment of travel management is changing rapidly in these days. Thus, competitive strategy and post computer technology are very important in this age that emphasizes integration. So, in this course, we will discuss the impact of electronic distribution on travel agents, the travel agent market place, trends and challenges, the competition with CRS-generation in the airline industry, marketing on the Internet, the development of an evolutionary tourism partnership model, service quality of travel agents, and successful relationships between hotels and agency’s service system. Students will be able to possess knowledge of travel planning and management in travel industry in the future.

Introduction to Public Health
本課程旨在闡明廣泛性之公共衛生概念，並進而體認公共衛生之理念、原則，明白公共衛生是一門預防疾病、延長壽命、促進健康的生活科學與藝術。主要的學習經驗包括探討公共衛生之理論、發展、趨勢及實務之應用等，以符合休閒產業與健康促進的核心價值進一步了解環境衛生、健康傳播、社區衛生、流行病學等知識，以明白如何透過早期偵測、介入的方式處理健康衛生問題，並發展出相關之社會機制，保障大多數人足以擁有、維持、體現健康與長壽之權利。
This course is aimed at elucidating the overall and general concepts of public health, and thereby catches the implicated ideology, principle, science and art of it, in order to prevent diseases, lengthen life span, enhance health, and then enrich the meaning and increase the efficiency of living/life. Learners would be guided to examine and to recognize the theories, evolutions, development, trends, and practical aspects of related issues. By means of organizing forces in the community, public health will be validated by being engaged in environmental health, infection control, personal hygiene, organized medical and nursing professionals, etc, in order to early detect, intervene and handle the health and hygiene issues, and then develop related social mechanism. Our goal is to ensure that the majority of people could own the rights of recognizing, possessing and maintaining the health and longevity.

Health Psychology
本課程主要是讓同學了解對於一些心理及生理之間的關聯和影響、概念及因應方法，包括生活中造成的心理壓力，與疾病的關係與因應，疾病之心理社會危險因子與心理介入計劃，瞭解慢性疾病的心理社會層面，如何預防及因應。學習如何保持良好生理及心理狀態相關健康行為，並學習評估自身對壓力反應的指標，並進一步了解有效的壓力因應方式。
本課程介紹如何以心理學的觀點來了解自己，對健康促進與提升、疾病預防與治療，以及病後復健與避免疾病再發的功能。諮商心理學生需了解健康心理學的基本觀念與實務狀況，未來方具基本能力針對生理、心理、社會相關健康問題，進行有效的預防與處理。
This course focuses on how to achieve a psychological point of view of health promotion and enhancement of disease prevention and treatment, and rehabilitation after illness and to avoid disease recurrence function. Counseling psychologists, students need to understand the basic concepts and practical conditions of health psychology, the next party with the capacity for physical, psychological, social and related health problems, effective prevention and treatment.

本課程銜接中學國文教育，著重培養學生閱讀、欣賞、寫作、口語表達等語言文字能力，並提升學生閱讀興趣、拓展人文視野，增進學生人文精神與文化涵養，進而落實至生活中，以培養獨立思考、理性自主的健全人格。
In this course students will study representative works of classical and modern literature, with an emphasis on improving verbal skills such as reading, writing, speaking and appreciation for Chinese literature. In doing so, the course aims to inspire students' interest in reading in order to expand on their knowledge, thus able to integrate vitality and cultural conservation into everyday life, whilst promoting independent, logical thinking and a healthy character.

Basic physiology
基礎生理學是研習醫學與健康科學等相關課程不可或缺的一門學問。本課程深入淺出地介紹人體生理學的基本原理，由細胞生理學入門，循序漸進探討各器官系統的生理作用。除了介紹各器官系統的功能之外，對生理機轉以及各系統間之相互關係亦有進一步說明。內容包括細胞生理學、神經與肌肉生理學、神經系統、循環生理學、呼吸生理學、腎臟生理學、消化道生理、內分泌及代謝之調節、生殖生理。
The purpose of this course is to introduce physiological principles and regulatory mechanisms and to help students to integrate related concepts and understand the relationship between structures and their functions. The contents include cellular physiology, physiology of nerve and muscle, central nervous system, cardiovascular system, respiratory system, renal physiology, gastrointestinal system, metabolism, endocrinology and reproduction.

01
Introduction of Gerontology
本課程旨在探討高齡學相關議題，包括：國家、社會、家庭、個人等不同面向．主要學習重點包含瞭解老化及老年相關之人口學、社會學、心理學、生理學等內容。學習者將會學到的老人生理層面包含：健康促進、長者運動、老年常見疾病等議題；心理層面則包含：心理健康、長者憂鬱、懷舊、面對生命最終規劃；社會層面包含：老年社會資源應用、居住安全、長期照顧安排、銀髮族相關社交與休閒的科學研究等相關議題；本課程還會特別介紹有關長壽科學與成功老化等國際科學研究之成果。
透過多層面教學與討論，將有助於學員掌握高齡相關專業知能及未來發展方向之規劃。
The goal of this course is to discuss general concepts of Gerontology related to nation, society, family, and individual. Main field will include: Demography, Sociology, Psychology, and Physiology. Learners will be familiar with important issues such as: health promotion, senior physical activity, common illness, mental health, depression of the elderly, reminiscence, hospice, social resources, safety of living, long-term care management, and researches related to benefits of leisure activity. National study of longevity and successful aging will be presented as well. Students will get profound knowledge and trend of gerontology through this comprehensive course.
全18週

Emergency Crisis Management for Travel Accidents

01
Tourism Service and Marketing
本課程旨在帶領學生以「問題導向學習」(Problem-Based Learning, PBL)深入探討：顧客服務、服務品質、服務策略及管理等重要議題。討論之內容包括：顧客服務的重要性、顧客抱怨的處理、如何超過顧客的期望、服務品質、顧客關係、服務管理的原理及運用、服務策略的擬定。並協助學生了解市場行銷學之各項理論，並進一步能活用各式行銷理念於觀光、餐旅及休憩之領域中。課程內容將包括：觀光行銷概論、觀光行銷環境與研究、觀光客行為、觀光市場區隔、目標市場與定位策略、觀光市場區隔、目標市場與定位策略、觀光產品與服務規劃、觀光定價決策、觀光通路決策、觀光推廣決策、觀光服務人員管理、觀光行銷實體環境管理、觀光服務流程管理、觀光生產力與服務品質管理、觀光顧客關係管理、觀光體驗行銷、觀光服務補救與異常事件管理等。
The purpose of the course is to enhance students’ understanding in customer service, service quality, service management and service strategies. The contents of the course include the importance of customer service, how to deal with customers’ complaints, how to exceed customers’ expectations, service quality, customer relationships, principles and applications of service management, and service strategies. By introducing the concepts and theories of marketing, it is to help students to apply those theories in tourism, restaurants and hotels. The contents of the course include service characteristics of tourism marketing, marketing strategic planning, marketing information system, consumer behaviors, market segmentation and positioning, customer loyalty and quality, product, price, place and sales promotion.
全18週

01
Environmental Education
本課程旨在闡述環境永續發展的意義與重要性，教學內涵希望提昇學生永續發展的覺知，增加永續發展的概念知識，培養正確的永續發展態度與價值觀，並發展永續發展的行動技能與行動經驗。課程強調在環境中進行教育，學習有關環境的知識、態度、技能，並且為實踐永續環境而準備。環境教育包含六個核心的學習要素：自然資源保育概念、環境管理概念的融入；生態原理、互動與互賴概念的融入；以及融入環境倫理與永續性的概念等。
    課程內容涵蓋環境概論、環境倫理、環境教育法規、環境變遷與防災、節能減碳與能源管理、與永續發展與生態保育等主題內容。教學策略運用：做中學、在真實的情境中體驗、合作學習法、運用感官學習、探索環境議題等項目。教學方法採取課堂講解、分組討論、專題討論、現地參訪等方式進行，並以多媒體教材教學。期望藉由環境議題的認識與討論，深入環境的內涵；透過對於環境問題的觀察與思考，了解環境永續的本質及善盡環境保護的義務。環境教育是一種教育的過程，在過程中個人認識他們的環境，以及組成環境的生物、物理和文化間的交互作用，得到知識、技能和價值觀，並能個別或集體地了解並解決現在和將來的環境問題。
Environmental education is designed to explain the meaning and importance of environment and sustainable development. It refers to organized efforts to teach how natural environments function, and particularly, how human beings can manage behavior and ecosystems to live sustainably. It is a multi-disciplinary field integrating disciplines such as biology, chemistry, physics, ecology, earth science, atmospheric science, mathematics, and geography. The term often implies education within the school system, from primary to post-secondary. However, it sometimes includes all efforts to educate the public and other audiences, including print materials, websites, media campaigns, etc. 
  Environmental education consists of six core elements: the concept of conservation of natural resources, environmental management into ecological principles, into the concept of interaction and interdependence; and the concept of integration of environmental ethics and sustainable environment. Environmental education is the teaching of individuals, and communities, in transitioning to a society that is knowledgeable of the environment and its associated problems, aware of the solutions to these problems, and motivated to solve them.Environmental education is an educational process, in the process of personal awareness in their environment, and form an environment of interaction between biological, physical and cultural, are knowledge, skills, and values, and individually or collectively, can understand and solve current and future environmental problems.
全18週

This subject is taught by way of introduction of Taiwan's health insurance system to let the students understand the NHI program. Furthermore, to improve health care quality and to secure financial soundness, "Second-generation NHI" was launched in 2013. It begins as teaching of the concept of the medical justice to introduce National Health Insurance Act. the medical and nursing law, the institution of the medical and nursing law. By undertanding NHI program and the NHI advantages, the students will be trained to have medical responsibilities. It also teaches the students to use the comparative study method to understand the update development of the medical and nursing law which can open the mind of the student's studying interest.
Global population aging, declining birth rate, labor shortage, and rising medical expenses, are all important issues to health insurance. To observe more, we must investigate the righteousness of National Health Insurance and reformation of Social Insurance. This topic is worth more pursuit and discussion in the future.

本課程主要介紹高齡照護常用的復健與輔具，課程以理論搭配實務操作為主。先介紹物理治療、職能治療、語言治療在居家、社區與機構中的功能與角色，接下來則學習針對不同對象給予適合的復健訓練。課程後半段則介紹高齡社會中常見的科技輔具，掌握基本原理、評估與操作技巧後，將以小組方式進行高齡輔具設計的提案。
This course introduces the rehabilitation and assistive technology in the elderly care fields. Lecture and clinical practice are included in this course. First, I will introduce the role of physical therapy, occupational therapy and speech therapy in home, community and institution based long term care. Second , students learn how to prescribe and execute the appropriate training program according the specific condition such as dementia, frailty or bed ridden. After mid term examination, I will introduce the assistive technology and devices in long term care fields. Students learn basic theory, evaluation and manipulation skills during 7 weeks. Finally, students need to present the proposal of gerontological product design in the form of group cooperation.

International Health Care Clinical Practice
本課程主要目的為協助學生了解國際健康照護實務之現況，增加學生國際高齡健康照護實務相關能力，藉由赴國際健康照護相關院校或機構進行修課(研習)或見習、高齡志工服務參觀活動之國際健康照護實務學習經驗，瞭解國際與台灣醫療制度與高齡健康照護模式之差異。
This course assists students in understanding current state of the gerontological health care oversea and increasing students’ communication skills in English and multicultural ability. Due to the experiences of having clinical practice in other countries, they will be able to understand the differences in gerontological health care delivery systems between Taiwan and other countries to enrich their vision.

Service Innovation and Management
本課程旨在探討面對環境快速變化的時代，企業必須更重視創新管理活動，並藉由有效的管理創新活動，達成企業永續經營的目標。本課程設計結合「健康產業概念」、「創新概念」與「管理」三個重要元素，涵蓋企業的創新能力、創新策略與創新執行過程等議題的探討。藉由課程上的互動與創新議題的討論，啟發同學對創新有不同思考與對創新管理有初步概念。希望修習本課程後，同學具備創新管理的基本觀念與實作能力，並能夠將課程所學運用於未來職場與服務創新。
The course is to help students face a rapidly changing and highly competitive environment of generations through innovative management; how to identify and solve problems .This course is designed for horizontal integration of the professional core subjects according to professional teams, product designs and marketing through knowledge and management.To apply this course is help students’innovation, technology , services, policies and other basic theories on health and seniors industry. It appeals the students to this course, nlightens their thinking and creativity from innovation practice and provides assistance on entering healthcare industries.

Geriatric HealthcareⅡ
以促進優質高齡者在居家型長期照護體系的晚年生活為設計概念，延緩高齡群族群失能或疾病狀態，協助學生瞭解我國高齡亞健康與失能族群者現況、醫療需求及預防保健措施。結合照顧管理專員或居家服務督導員之業界實務，運用居家型長期照護的專業知識，深入探討台灣高齡者健康照護、居家環境設計、退休生活及財務規劃等問題，以期實際增進學生照護高齡者的能力。
In order to promote the concept of high quality living of the elderly people in the home long term care and delay the disability or disease status of elderly group, this course is designed to help students know our current situation of the suboptimal health elderly people and disabled group, the medical need and prevention health care. The integration of care managers and home care service supervisors was completed to improve the ability to care elderly people by applying the professional knowledge of home long term care to intensively explore the issues of the elderly health care, home environment design, the living after retirement and financial plan in Taiwan.

History of Artistic Culture
透過藝術文化的類型與不同的表現形式及中西方藝術的演進與賞析，瞭解藝術的理念、內涵與歷史演變，深入探討藝術與生命、美感與生活、藝術與文化等重要議題之意義。培養學生對藝術文化有基本的認識與高度的敏感度，提升審美素養，持續自主學習的興趣。
Through the exploration of various types and form of art and culture, as well as the evolution and appreciation of Eastern and Western art, this course provides an understanding of the concepts, meaning and historical transformations of arts. It further delves deeply into significant topics such as art and life, aesthetics and everyday life, and art and culture. Students will acquire a foundational comprehension and heightened sensitivity of art and culture, enhance their aesthetic literacy, and foster a sustained commitment to self-directed education.

01
Special Topic- Net Zero‧Sustainable‧ Green Living
聯合國為減緩人類對大氣、海洋及陸地暖化的影響，共同緩減全球暖化的趨勢於
2015年在巴黎協定氣候協議，期望降低氣候變遷帶來的風險。為呼應全球淨零趨勢，我國也
宣布2050淨零轉型為臺灣重要政策目標。本校以健康照護為特色，在淨零生活驅動下，激勵
共護地球責任，引導學生具備環境永續知能。本課程以行政院2022年的「生活轉型」策略為
主，以學生生活必需的飲食及衣飾與美妝切入，從消費選擇兼顧乾淨再生，建構低碳生活方
式，發展小綠大能信念天使，帶領學生推動綠色照護，落實綠健康於校園及社區。 
教學方式以專題演講、綠能產業分享參訪、分組討論等方式，領學生從認識淨零與
生活，產生綠與淨相關教案。透過高齡場域及非營利幼兒園行動宣導，啟動老幼雙寶綠有勁
的健康生活。從做中學，將教室學習延伸到社區，與社區民眾攜手響應低碳生活行動，改變
生活習慣邁向淨零排放目標。
In order to slow down the impact of human beings on the warming of the 
atmosphere, oceans and land, the United Nations jointly slowed down the trend of global warming in the 
Paris Climate Agreement in 2015, hoping to reduce the risks caused by climate change. In response to the 
global net-zero trend, my country has also announced the 2050 net-zero transformation as an important 
policy goal for Taiwan. Our school features health care, drives a net-zero life, encourages the 
responsibility of protecting the earth, and guides students to acquire environmental sustainability 
knowledge. 
This course is based on the "Life Transformation" strategy of the Executive Yuan in 2022, focusing 
on the food, clothing and beauty necessary for students' daily life, taking into account clean regeneration 
from consumption choices, building a low-carbon lifestyle, and developing the Little Green and Powerful 
Belief Angel , leading students to promote green care and implement green health on campus and in the 
community. The teaching method uses special lectures, green energy industry sharing visits, group 
discussions, etc. to lead students to understand net zero and life, and generate green and net related lesson 
plans. Through action promotion in the elderly field and non-profit kindergartens, we can start a healthy 
life with green treasures for both old and young. Learn by doing, extend classroom learning to the 
community, work with the community to respond to low-carbon life actions, change living habits and 
move towards the goal of net-zero emissions.
全18週

Introduction to Intelligent Exoskeleton Fundamental Practice
本課程旨在提供初階智能外骨骼實務應用相關基礎的訓練，課程內容先以基本的人類肌動學、動作控制與學習、步態分析教學做重點介紹後，再延伸出搭配智能外骨骼之復能訓練，學習智能外骨骼的原理、保養及穿戴方式，透過實際練習來感受智能外骨骼機器所帶來的助益，並搭配精準之動作分析及力量感測儀器，深入探討外骨骼機器與人和諧運作時的運動學及動理學分析，培育出新一代的跨醫學及工程領域之人才。
This course is designed to provide basic training on the practical application of intelligent exoskeleton robots. The course content starts with basic human kinematics, movement control and learning, and gait analysis, and then extends to the rehabilitation training of exoskeleton robots, learning the principles of exoskeleton robots, maintenance and wearing methods, experiencing the benefits of intelligent exoskeleton robots through practical exercises, and with precise movement analysis and strength sensing instruments, and deeply exploring the kinematics and kinetic analysis of exoskeleton robots when they operate in harmony with humans, cultivating a new generation of talents across medical and engineering fields.
全18週

Psychology
本課程主要內容是以心理學各種基礎理論、研究方法及重要實驗為主，進而擴展應用於心理衛生各種人類生活適應行為及生活層面。課程綱要包括心理學的起源與發展、基礎理論與研究方法、行為的生物學基礎、意識狀態、感覺與知覺、學習與行為、記憶、思維與智力、心理評量:人格與智力測驗、人類發展、動機與情緒、人格、壓力與衝突、異常行為、心理治療方式、社會知覺與認知、態度、社會影響與互動。
The main content of this curriculum is to expand and apply the fundamental theory, research method, and important experiment in psychology to mental health in various living line includes the origin and development of psychology, fundamental theory and research method, fundamentals of behavioral biology, consciousness, sensation and perception, leaning, cognition, memory, thinking and intelligence, psychological assessment, personality and intelligence test, human development, motivation and emotion, personality stress and conflict, abnormal behavior psychotherapeutics social perception, cognition, attitude, and social influence and interaction.

本課程旨在提供初階智能外骨骼實務應用相關基礎的訓練，課程內容先以基本的人類肌動學、動作控制與學習、步態分析教學做重點介紹後，再延伸出搭配智能外骨骼之復能訓練，學習智能外骨骼的原理、保養及穿戴方式，透過實際練習來感受智能外骨骼機器所帶來的助益，並搭配精準之動作分析及力量感測儀器，深入探討外骨骼機器與人和諧運作時的運動學及動理學分析，培育出新一代的跨醫學及工程領域之人才。

The course content starts with basic human kinematics, movement control and learning, and gait analysis, and then extends to the rehabilitation training of exoskeleton robots, learning the principles of exoskeleton robots, maintenance and wearing methods, experiencing the benefits of intelligent exoskeleton robots through practical exercises, and with precise movement analysis and strength sensing instruments, and deeply exploring the kinematics and kinetic analysis of exoskeleton robots when they operate in harmony with humans, cultivating a new generation of talents across medical and engineering fields.
全18週

It further delves deeply into significant topics such as art and life, aesthetics and everyday life, and art and culture. Students will acquire a foundational comprehension and heightened sensitivity of art and culture, enhance their aesthetic literacy, and foster a sustained commitment to self-directed education.

Statistics application and health data analysis using open source software
本課程旨在建立學生 R 語言的能力，並具備使用 RStudio 整理並分析建康相關資料的能力。為使學生能具備上述能力，本課程將先透過分段講述的方式，使學生對 R、RStudio、套件、語法有基本認識；然後依每次資料處理與分析的主題，讓學透過實作練習整合所聽見的內容，並從親手操作的過程及具體結果間進行觀察學習。再藉由敘說操作的過程及具體結果，與同儕共同反思，以增進學生應用 R 與 RStudio 整理並分析建康相關資料的能力。本課程將涵蓋 (1) R 與 RStudio 軟體簡介，(2) 資料結構與基本資料處理策略，(3) 基礎與實用套件與語法，(4) 初等統計，(5) 統計繪圖等。
This course aims to build students' R language abilities and the ability to use RStudio to organize and analyze health-related materials. In order to enable students to possess the above-mentioned abilities, this course will first give students a basic understanding of R, RStudio, packages, and grammar through segmented narration; then, according to the theme of data processing and analysis each time, students will learn through practical Do exercises to integrate what you hear, and observe and learn from the hands-on process and specific results. Then, by describing the process and specific results of the operation, and reflecting with peers, students can improve their ability to use R and RStudio to organize and analyze health-related data. This course will cover (1) introduction to R and RStudio software, (2) data structure and basic data processing strategies, (3) basic packages and syntax, (4) elementary statistics, (5) statistical drawing, etc.

Philosophy and Life
「哲學與人生」是對「人的生命」所作的「哲學反省」。人，作為自然的、社會的、歷史的存在，在他所生活的世界中，面臨著繁複多樣、瞬息萬變的問題：處境、命運、愛情、知識、道德、藝術、宗教、臨終與死亡……其中有些問題事實上已經深深困擾著我們，另外一些則伺機突襲，在我們還來不及準備的時候，就被迫面對。生命的意義究竟是什麼？本課程嘗試以深入淺出的討論，藉由過去、當代人物的所感、所思，促進學習者進一步反省自我生命之種種。
Philosophy and Life is as a philosophical reflective thinking for the life.
Human beings, as natural, social and historical beings, face a great many complex varied and fast changing problems in the life-world, for example, love, destiny, knowledge, morality, art, religion, dying, and moreover the death so on.... Actually some of them have deeply perplexed us, while others watch for their chances to attack there would leave no time for covering our ears and we are merely compelled to confront with them. After all, what does Life mean?
Whereas this course tries to take up by the way a kind of discussion in explaining the profound in simple terms, and in making use of whatever in history, or the present age somebody's feeling and thinking, in order to promote the students to question themselves more about, and reflect further on all sorts of life-self.
全18週

01
Healthcare Industrial Organization Observation
本課程旨在協助健康事業管理系四技學生，在修讀健管專業課程過程，對健康產業的新型態主要服務機構具備基本的瞭解。本課程配合教育部「103學年度補助遴聘業界專家協同教學計畫」，引進台北地區長期照護服務機構負責單位/主管人員協同教學，內容將包括五部份，分別是：
(1)	 本校教師介紹台灣健康照護服務體系及健康事業機構(包括長期照護)組織屬性與其管理。
(2)	 邀請長期照護機構實務管理人員，分別介紹台灣各類型長期照護服務機構之經營管理，並側重各類型長照機構業務的生命關懷面向。
(3)	 藉業界專家之協助，實地參訪台灣各類型長期照護服務機構，其中將針對參訪學習要素，於課堂進行行前輔導，包括觀察重點，資料蒐集及其分析整體技巧，團隊分工等。在此同時，也配合健康事業管理系主軸學習活動計畫，開放系上學生報名參與並納入分組，以累積學習歷程積分。
(4)	 本校教師在實地參訪前、後進行自主學習輔導，包括觀察重點、資料蒐集、分析整體技巧、團隊分工等，引發學生深入思考，並藉參訪時機深度觀察與學習。

The purpose of the lesson is to provide students with organized understanding on healthcare industrial organizations’ operation and management.

01
Philosophy and Life
「哲學與人生」是對「人的生命」所作的「哲學反省」。人，作為自然的、社會的、歷史的存在，在他所生活的世界中，面臨著繁複多樣、瞬息萬變的問題：處境、命運、愛情、知識、道德、藝術、宗教、臨終與死亡……其中有些問題事實上已經深深困擾著我們，另外一些則伺機突襲，在我們還來不及準備的時候，就被迫面對。生命的意義究竟是什麼？本課程嘗試以深入淺出的討論，藉由過去、當代人物的所感、所思，促進學習者進一步反省自我生命之種種。
Philosophy and Life is as a philosophical reflective thinking for the life.
Human beings, as natural, social and historical beings, face a great many complex varied and fast changing problems in the life-world, for example, love, destiny, knowledge, morality, art, religion, dying, and moreover the death so on.... Actually some of them have deeply perplexed us, while others watch for their chances to attack there would leave no time for covering our ears and we are merely compelled to confront with them. After all, what does Life mean?
Whereas this course tries to take up by the way a kind of discussion in explaining the profound in simple terms, and in making use of whatever in history, or the present age somebody's feeling and thinking, in order to promote the students to question themselves more about, and reflect further on all sorts of life-self.
全18週

Introduction to Health and Social Behavior

人類的行為表現或生活方式對健康有極大的影響，而透過行為與社會科學的知識運用則可以幫助我們進一步去了解健康與社會行為的發展脈絡，並研擬可能的介入方案，以達到健康促進的目的。本課程運用行為與社會科學的知識，幫助學生了解健康與社會行為的關係，由理論變項間探討健康與個人、組織、團體、文化等行為各層面之影響因素。藉此有系統的理論模式學習，瞭解如何改變人類的健康認知信念、態度，並擴及產生正向積極的健康行動，並學習健康心理學、 健康促進與衛生教育概念、原理、與實務 、 健康促進與衛生教育方案之規劃、策略與評價與健康/醫療社會學的相關內容。

01
Economics
本課程主要講授經濟學的基本概念與原理，其內容包含個體與總體經濟學兩部分。個體經濟學的部分會從供給與需求入手，逐步介紹效用、需求及供給彈或、生產與成本及完全與不完全競爭市場理論。「總體經濟學」則以國民所得開始，陸續介紹貨幣供需、財政政策與貨幣政策、失業與物價、國際貿易等議題。課程著重於各章節的概念及結合生活時事，以數理模型為輔助。
This course mainly teaches the basic concepts and principles of economics, and its content includes two parts: individual economics and general economics. The part of individual economics will start with supply and demand, and gradually introduce utility, demand and supply elasticity, production and cost, and perfect and imperfect competition market theory. "General Economics" begins with national income, and then introduces issues such as money supply and demand, fiscal policy and monetary policy, unemployment and prices, and international trade. The course focuses on the concepts of each chapter and combined with current events in life, assisted by mathematical models.
全18週

Programming Logic
本課程教學內容分為「基本程式介紹」、「邏輯思考訓練」與「檔案的處理」
司三大主題，課程使用 C 程式語言進行教學。課程一開始，會介紹 C 語言基本
輸入輸入語法、條件敘述(Conditional Statement)與迴圈敘述(Loop Statement)，然
後進入邏輯思考訓練。
對於一程式設計者而言，無論撰寫何種程式語言，通常有超過一半的程式碼，
都會被包含於條件敘述與迴圈敘述中，此兩種敘述包含了大量的資料結構與邏輯
觀念，表面上看似簡單，但多層下的條件敘述與迴圈敘述，往往對程式初學者產
生很大的程式障礙，因此，課程將由基本的觀念開始，結合資料結構之概念，培
養同學撰寫程式所需之基本能力。
接著，課程會加入檔案的處理，並與生活中的例子結合，進行資料的擷取與
分析，以學習利用程式來簡化工作，以達到課程學以致用之目標。
Though programming is mainly associated with the field of computer
management, but writing good and optimized code is mostly an art. The purpose of
the class is to train students’ programming logic. We will begin with an installation of
Teacher’s academic code: 9996
the C language. We will then develop programs that test students’ mind skills. Also,
the course has lots of logic puzzles which have to solve. Following the class, students’
logic could be improved. In the long term, we hope that the course can improve
students’technique for every programming language.
全18週

Knowledge Management
知識管理促進個人/組織的知識、know-how、專家技藝、智慧資本及其他形態的知識的創造、再利用與散布，能從企業的學習性組織及核心競爭力中創造與獲得較大的價值。 知識管理能點出個別企業的特定問題，例如，是要創造與配送創新產品或服務；或是管理與加強跟顧客、夥伴與供應商的關係；還是改善工作流程。知識管理對企業的主要意義是整合散布在各處的知識，並將之適當地運用。
Knowledge Management (KM) refers to a range of practices and techniques used by individuals /organizations to identify, represent and distribute knowledge, know-how, expertise, intellectual capital and other forms of knowledge for creation, reuse and transfer of knowledge and e-learning across the organization.
Knowledge Management programs are typically claimed to be tied to specific organizational objectives and are intended to lead to the achievement of specific targeted results such as improved performance, competitive advantage, or higher levels of innovation.  The contents of this course include Part 1: Main Idea, Part 2:Management, Part 3: KM Flowcharts, Part 4:Information System, etc.

01
Introduction to Research Methodology
本課程旨在提供學生基本的研究知識與技能。學生除了對實務情境產生質疑，並藉由討論、批判、觀摩等活動，提升團隊合作、問題解決和批判性思考等能力。課程內容包括研究與專業發展間的關係、研究基本概念、研究步驟、研究計畫的撰寫和研究文獻的批判。
This course is designed to accomplish four objectives. The course will begin with issues in scientific thinking, model building, and ethical implications. Second, it will familiarize students with major procedures in research design, such as the formation of research questions, literature review, conceptualization and operationalization of research questions, research design, questionnaire design, and sampling procedures. Third, the course will examine alternate methods in data collection and analysis with special emphasis on the evaluation of data quality such as reliability and validity. Tools and Applications on Big Data Analysis
隨著資訊科技進步，現今資料累積的速度遠遠超過所能處理的速度。無論科學研究或是各種企業應用領域，許多單位都以資料分析做為組織未來的重要發展方向。R和 Python是開放源碼軟體，為資料分析使用的工具相當適合。期望提供學生一個良好的大數據軟體學習路徑，幫助初學者運用軟體，學習資料探勘工作與視覺化應用。
課程內容從軟體基本概念與資料整理入手，介紹與健康及醫療相關之巨量資料的基本知識與方法，資料的理解與統計等基本觀念的建立，介紹資料挖礦與大數據分析的理論方法與應用，並進行實機演練程式設計，進而提升學生大數據分析和數位決策能力。
With the advancement of information technology, data now accumulated much faster than that we can handle. In science or a variety of enterprise organizations, data analysis has become an important direction for decision making. R and Python are open source software, and is suitable to be used as analysis tools. In this course, we expect to provide students with a good learning path for software used on helping beginners to learn data visualization and data mining. Course contains the basic concepts of software and data compilation, the basic knowledge and methods of health and medical information, the basic concepts of statistics, the theory and method of data mining and analysis, and hands-on programming exercises. Students abilities of the big data analytics and digital decision-making will be enhanced.

01
Management and Practice of Health care Institutions
本課程旨在協助學生將過去所學如何運用於健康照護機構實際管理。課程內容以健康照護機構所面臨問題及實務演練為主，範圍從健康照護管理的簡介開始，再依循管理的過程分別介紹健康照護機構管理有關的主題如健康照護體系面臨經營環境、健康照護管理發展策略規劃、組織運作、績效管理與激勵、人力資源管理、品質管理、財務管理、風險管理及危機應變等之實務層面，期學生能藉此課程，對健康照護管理有更深入地認識，以激發自己在醫院管理方面之興趣。
This course aims to enhance students' practice ability of health care management.  Focusing on health care system and the problems faced by health care institutions, discusses how to resolve and manage including theory and practice of health care management. Introduces key topics and concepts related to the management of health care institutions such as health care system, case studies in strategy management and decision making, managing health care organizations,  administrative management responsibilities of health care environments, quality assurance management methods, human resources management, approaches to performance improvement financial management, risk or crisis management and response. Particular emphasis is placed on integrating analytic skills and conflict resolution methods into the practice of health care management. A portion of the class is devoted to simulation exercise in which general concepts and methods are demonstrated and practiced.  By the end of the course, it is expected that students will more understand and be inspired interest in hospital management.
全18週

01
Philosophy and Life
「哲學與人生」是對「人的生命」所作的「哲學反省」。人，作為自然的、社會的、歷史的存在，在他所生活的世界中，面臨著繁複多樣、瞬息萬變的問題：處境、命運、愛情、知識、道德、藝術、宗教、臨終與死亡……其中有些問題事實上已經深深困擾著我們，另外一些則伺機突襲，在我們還來不及準備的時候，就被迫面對。生命的意義究竟是什麼？本課程嘗試以深入淺出的討論，藉由過去、當代人物的所感、所思，促進學習者進一步反省自我生命之種種。
Philosophy and Life is as a philosophical reflective thinking for the life.
Human beings, as natural, social and historical beings, face a great many complex varied and fast changing problems in the life-world, for example, love, destiny, knowledge, morality, art, religion, dying, and moreover the death so on.... Actually some of them have deeply perplexed us, while others watch for their chances to attack there would leave no time for covering our ears and we are merely compelled to confront with them. After all, what does Life mean?
Whereas this course tries to take up by the way a kind of discussion in explaining the profound in simple terms, and in making use of whatever in history, or the present age somebody's feeling and thinking, in order to promote the students to question themselves more about, and reflect further on all sorts of life-self.
全18週

01
E-Commerce
隨著網際網路及資訊技術的不斷進步，流通業者在科技工具的運用上就愈發成熟與專業，如此除了能提昇企業經營效益外，最重要的是能分析消費者需求，進而提供消費者更好的產品及服務。課程主要為教導學生瞭解現行電子商務的範疇及導入的模式，從電子商務架構概論、開創市場機會、經營模式、市場行銷等單元介紹，進而切入企業電子化角度介紹企業資源於電子商務之應用，同時以實例探討，期望學生能清楚地瞭解電子商務的發展、技術與策略，並激發其對該領域的實作、研究及分析評估能力。
The digital economy, also known as the Internet economy, is an economy based on online transactions, mostly e-commerce. It includes digital wireline or wireless communication networks (e.g., the Internet, intranets, extranets, and VANs), computers, software, and other related information technologies.
In our course, we will lead to understand the phenomena, both technological, economic and social, behind these rapid changes, and how organizations successfully conduct Internet-based activities. This course provides an overview of e-commerce from both technological and managerial perspectives. It introduces e-commerce frameworks, and technological foundations; and examine basic concepts such as strategic formulation for e-commerce enterprises, management of their capital structures and public policy. This course is designed to familiarize students with current and emerging electronic commerce technologies using the Internet. Topics include Internet technology for business advantage, managing electronic commerce funds transfer, reinventing the future of business through electronic commerce, business opportunities in electronic commerce, electronic commerce Web site design, social, political and ethical issues associated with e-commerce, and business plans for technology ventures.
全18週

The course aims to combine two fields offered in the major in Health and Exercise Science: “exercise and health promotion” and “stress relief and physiotherapy”. It is anticipated that the students who have taken this course will be able to have knowledge of biomechanics, anatomy, physiology, psychophysiology, exercise prescription and Chinese medicine meridian. Students can not only learn the general knowledge of athletic training, and healthcare, but also how to prevent the potential
movement injuries in exercise or sports.

Psychology
心理學是一門研究人性 (包括心智活動或心理歷程) 的學科，更是大學教育中的必修通識科目之一。心理學和一般自然科學的共同源頭都是哲學，自然科學研究的內容是大自然可見的各種現象，心理學則探討人類行為和人性變化的機制和成因。學習以科學方法為研究手段的現代心理學，可以幫助學生認識生命的價值，使其瞭解自我存在的意義，並關心他人和珍惜所處環境。
Psychology is a professional discipline studying the humanity, including mind activity and psychological processing.  As the course  required in college/university education, psychology investigates the mechanisms and consequences of human behaviors and humanistic changes.  This is different from the general scientific courses that study the visible phenomena in nature.  Learning the modern psychology based on scientific approaches can help students being aware of the values of life.  It can also make students to understand the insides in themselves, care about others, and appreciate the environment surrounding them.

Introduction to physical activity and Health Promotion
本課程主要讓學生了解運動訓練與身體活動之基本概念，對於學生在未來從事不同族群之運動訓練應用與實務操作具備有應有的基本原則。課程中分為學科與實務操作部分，在身體活動之學科部分簡述運動訓練法、營養與健康與不同族群體適能指導原則，術科以實務操作方式進行不同族群體適能量測原理與操作課程(以國民體適能指導員-初級考核能力為主)；在健康促進課程部分，會以公共衛生之角度說明台灣在人口老化與長照政策之變革、族群健康與疾病發展與運動健康促進計畫為課程主軸，並以運動健康促進之觀點設計健康促進計畫。
This course mainly allows students to understand the basic concepts of exercise training methods and principles for improvement of physical activities in different populations. The course is divided into discipline and practical operation parts. In the discipline part of exercise training for physical activities, the physiological adaptation, nutrition management, specific physical fitness analysis and special population fitness will be briefly described. Besides, it will also introduce the ageing of Taiwan's population and long-term care policies, ageing and disease development, exercise health promotion plans, and physical activity assessments as the perspective of public health. Taken together, the exercise health promotion plans will be designed according to the principles of exercise training and periodization.

Introduction to Athletic Training and Health
本課程旨在教導學生運用現代醫學保健的知識和方法，配合解剖學和公共衛生學等相關學科，對運動參與者進行醫學監督和指導。一方面可以促進和改善不同族群身體活動的能力，同時也可以預防運動時所可能產生的運動傷害。
This course, accompanied with anatomy and public health, is to instruct students to understand the general knowledge of athletic training and health. It also provides students with the ability to medically supervise the exercise participants.  Students can not only learn how to improve physical activity for different groups of people, but also how  to prevent the potential movement injuries in exercise or sports.

Psychology
心理學是一門研究人性 (包括心智活動或心理歷程) 的學科，更是大學教育中的必修通識科目之一。心理學和一般自然科學的共同源頭都是哲學，自然科學研究的內容是大自然可見的各種現象，心理學則探討人類行為和人性變化的機制和成因。學習以科學方法為研究手段的現代心理學，可以幫助學生認識生命的價值，使其瞭解自我存在的意義，並關心他人和珍惜所處環境。
Psychology is a professional discipline studying the humanity, including mind activity and psychological processing.  As the course  required in college/university education, psychology investigates the mechanisms and consequences of human behaviors and humanistic changes.  This is different from the general scientific courses that study the visible phenomena in nature.  Learning the modern psychology based on scientific approaches can help students being aware of the values of life.  It can also make students to understand the insides in themselves, care about others, and appreciate the environment surrounding them.
全18週

Introduction to physical activity and Health Promotion
本課程主要讓學生了解運動訓練與身體活動之基本概念，對於學生在未來從事不同族群之運動訓練應用與實務操作具備有應有的基本原則。課程中分為學科與實務操作部分，在身體活動之學科部分簡述運動訓練法、營養與健康與不同族群體適能指導原則，術科以實務操作方式進行不同族群體適能量測原理與操作課程(以國民體適能指導員-初級考核能力為主)；在健康促進課程部分，會以公共衛生之角度說明台灣在人口老化與長照政策之變革、族群健康與疾病發展與運動健康促進計畫為課程主軸，並以運動健康促進之觀點設計健康促進計畫。
This course mainly allows students to understand the basic concepts of exercise training methods and principles for improvement of physical activities in different populations. The course is divided into discipline and practical operation parts. In the discipline part of exercise training for physical activities, the physiological adaptation, nutrition management, specific physical fitness analysis and special population fitness will be briefly described. Besides, it will also introduce the ageing of Taiwan's population and long-term care policies, ageing and disease development, exercise health promotion plans, and physical activity assessments as the perspective of public health. Taken together, the exercise health promotion plans will be designed according to the principles of exercise training and periodization.
全18週

01
Environmental Education
本課程旨在闡述環境永續發展的意義與重要性，教學內涵希望提昇學生永續發展的覺知，增加永續發展的概念知識，培養正確的永續發展態度與價值觀，並發展永續發展的行動技能與行動經驗。課程強調在環境中進行教育，學習有關環境的知識、態度、技能，並且為實踐永續環境而準備。環境教育包含六個核心的學習要素：自然資源保育概念、環境管理概念的融入；生態原理、互動與互賴概念的融入；以及融入環境倫理與永續性的概念等。
    課程內容涵蓋環境概論、環境倫理、環境教育法規、環境變遷與防災、節能減碳與能源管理、與永續發展與生態保育等主題內容。教學策略運用：做中學、在真實的情境中體驗、合作學習法、運用感官學習、探索環境議題等項目。教學方法採取課堂講解、分組討論、專題討論、現地參訪等方式進行，並以多媒體教材教學。期望藉由環境議題的認識與討論，深入環境的內涵；透過對於環境問題的觀察與思考，了解環境永續的本質及善盡環境保護的義務。環境教育是一種教育的過程，在過程中個人認識他們的環境，以及組成環境的生物、物理和文化間的交互作用，得到知識、技能和價值觀，並能個別或集體地了解並解決現在和將來的環境問題。
Environmental education is designed to explain the meaning and importance of environment and sustainable development. It refers to organized efforts to teach how natural environments function, and particularly, how human beings can manage behavior and ecosystems to live sustainably. It is a multi-disciplinary field integrating disciplines such as biology, chemistry, physics, ecology, earth science, atmospheric science, mathematics, and geography. The term often implies education within the school system, from primary to post-secondary. However, it sometimes includes all efforts to educate the public and other audiences, including print materials, websites, media campaigns, etc. 
  Environmental education consists of six core elements: the concept of conservation of natural resources, environmental management into ecological principles, into the concept of interaction and interdependence; and the concept of integration of environmental ethics and sustainable environment. Environmental education is the teaching of individuals, and communities, in transitioning to a society that is knowledgeable of the environment and its associated problems, aware of the solutions to these problems, and motivated to solve them.Environmental education is an educational process, in the process of personal awareness in their environment, and form an environment of interaction between biological, physical and cultural, are knowledge, skills, and values, and individually or collectively, can understand and solve current and future environmental problems.

“Aquatic Activity and Sport Instruction” is a course that covers a variety of water sports such as swimming, water volleyball, canoeing, SUP stand-up paddling and snorkeling. The goals of this course are: students will be able to master the basic skills of swimming, water volleyball, canoeing, SUP paddling and snorkeling, including stance, breathing, arm and leg movements, passing, catching, jumping, dunking, canoe control, SUP paddling, and snorkeling positions. Students will be able to understand the safety knowledge and emergency disposal methods of water sports, how to choose safety equipment and keep themselves safe, and take emergency measures in emergency situations. Students will be able to master the training methods of water sports, including skill training, physical training, tactical training, etc., to improve their skills and competition ability. Through this course, students will not only learn the fun of water sports, but also improve their physical fitness and water sports skills, so that they can be more confident and safer in guiding water activities.

Functional Training Instruction
功能性訓練指導課程有五大部分，包括基礎理論、核心穩定訓練、運動訓練處方，以及基礎理論和技巧實踐。基礎理論部分介紹了功能性訓練的概念和原理；核心穩定訓練則讓學員學習如何發展身體核心穩定性；運動訓練處方教學，讓學生了解如何量身打造訓練方案，針對客戶個人需求提供專業的訓練建議。最後，基礎理論和技巧實踐部分讓學生實踐所學並了解常見訓練技巧，讓學生能夠應用在日常訓練及工作職場中。
The Functional Training Instruction has five main components, including basic theory, core stability training, exercise training prescription, and basic theory and technique practice. The fundamental theory section introduces the concepts and principles of functional training; the core stability training section allows students to learn how to develop core stability; and the sports training prescription section provides students with an understanding of how to tailor training programs to provide professional training advice to meet the needs of individual clients. Finally, the fundamental theory and skills in practice section allows students to practice what they have learned and understand common training techniques that they can apply in their daily training and in the workplace.

旨在培育學生運動與保健的實務能力。運動保健實習更加強著重於基本的體適能和運動指導者能力之養成，學生於建教機構中，透過觀察與實習而漸進入實務操作，學習體適能和運動指導者所應扮演的角色與職責。學生透過實務實習，體適能和運動指導計畫之設計與執行而達成學習目標。
The intern develops students’ abilities in health-related sports and exercises.  The goal of the exercise and health interns is to cultivate students with enough abilities in being health/fitness instructors.  In the intern institutes, students learn to appreciate the roles and duties of being health/fitness instructors via observations and practices.  They also learn how to design and run a health-related fitness/exercise project, and achieve their own goals they set before the intern.

This course aims to help graduate students to establish a solid foundation in the field of speech sciences, especially the anatomy, physiology, and theory of speech sciences. Research Method
本堂課提供學生學習應用於不同領域的研究方法，包含研究假說設立、質性與量性研究法、抽樣設計、文獻搜尋、研究上倫理考量、調查研究法,資料收集的基本概念及其策略、溝通障礙學研究、統計分析及其資料解釋，與撰寫專題研究計劃案。本課程在幫助學生認識各種溝通障礙研究法，建立溝通障礙研究的基本概念，並培養參與及進行溝通障礙研究之基本能力

Phonetics and Acoustic Phonetics
本課程是為未來聽語臨床工作者所設計之基礎語音學及語音聲學課程。在這門課中，透過不同語言中的語音實例，探討人類的發音器官、語音本質、產生語音的方法及說話時的語音聽知覺與聲學變化。學生在這門課中亦將學習國際音標符號，並使用這些音標及符號標示及描述或記錄語音。本課程亦將帶領學生學習語音聲學分析，學生將熟悉語音聲學分析的學理基礎、以及語音分析軟體的實務操作。
This is an introduction to areas of phonetics of languages in the world geared towards speech-language pathologists and audiologists. Students will explore their articulators and learn how individuals produce and perceive speech sounds. They will also explore various topics regarding speech sounds and learn to describe and transcribe sounds in spoken languages.
This course is also designed to introduce the acoustic aspects of speech production and speech perception.  Students will learn software implementation of acoustic analysis.  This course covers the acoustic theory of speech production, and the practical applications for the acoustic analysis of speech.  The acoustic characteristics of Mandarin speech sounds will also be included.

Swallowing  Disorders Practicum
讓學生從實作中，學習吞嚥篩檢工具、床邊吞嚥檢查評估工具等的使用及判讀方法。依據吞嚥異常評估結果，擬定治療策略。再經由探討頭頸部腫瘤個案及神經性異常個案之吞嚥問題，學習該類個案吞嚥代償性治療、直接治療、間接治療等方法，以培養臨床處置吞嚥障礙個案之基礎實務技能。
The goal of this course is to teach students learn swallowing screening tools, bedside swallow assessment etc. and their interpretations from hands on practice. Based on diagnostic impression, the students should learn to make treatment plan for swallowing disorders. From knowledge of swallowing problems of head and neck cancer and neurologic impairments, the students should learn compensatory strategies, direct therapy and indirect therapy from hands on practice to build up their clinical skills for swallowing disorders.

Voice Disorders Practicum
讓學生從實作中，學習嗓音評估工具，包括病史、聽知覺評估、自評、聲學及氣
動學測量等的使用及判讀方法。依據嗓音評估結果，擬定嗓音治療計劃。再經由實際練習各種嗓音治療方法，包括衛教嗓音治療、症狀嗓音治療、心理嗓音治療、及生理嗓音治療，以培養臨床處置嗓音障礙個案之實務技能。

Based on diagnostic impression, the students should learn to make treatment plan for voice disorders. From hands on practice a variety of treatment methods including vocal hygiene, symptomatic voice therapy, psychogenic voice therapy and physiological voice therapy, the students will build up their clinical skills for voice disorders.

History of Artistic Culture
透過藝術文化的類型與不同的表現形式及中西方藝術的演進與賞析，瞭解藝術的理念、內涵與歷史演變，深入探討藝術與生命、美感與生活、藝術與文化等重要議題之意義。培養學生對藝術文化有基本的認識與高度的敏感度，提升審美素養，持續自主學習的興趣。
Through the exploration of various types and form of art and culture, as well as the evolution and appreciation of Eastern and Western art, this course provides an understanding of the concepts, meaning and historical transformations of arts. It further delves deeply into significant topics such as art and life, aesthetics and everyday life, and art and culture. Students will acquire a foundational comprehension and heightened sensitivity of art and culture, enhance their aesthetic literacy, and foster a sustained commitment to self-directed education.

Freshman English I
本課程為一學期兩小時兩學分的閱讀課程。教學重點為文法重點複習、閱讀技巧及練習、普通英文文章閱讀。於該課程中學生能熟練高初級至初中級(high beginning ~ low-intermediate level)基本文法重點，學習並運用各種英文閱讀技巧，閱讀並理解高初級至初中級(high beginning ~ low-intermediate level)普通英文文章。
This is a one-semester course which is worth two credits and includes a two-hour reading instruction each week. The main contents of the course consist of: grammar review, reading skills and practice, and general English text reading. In this course, students are expected to become familiar with English grammar (from high beginning ~ low-intermediate level), learn different reading skills, and apply the skills to their comprehension of English texts (from high beginning ~ low-intermediate level).
全18週

Pediatric Physiology
本課程以學生在高職學校學得之生物學知識為基礎，協助其更進一步瞭解人體生理學原理及探討比較幼兒生理功能之基本知識，並強調各器官系統間之調節機轉。內容包括細胞生理學、神經與肌肉生理學、循環生理學、呼吸生理學、消化道生理、腎臟生理學、代謝之調節、生殖生理及內分泌學。
The purpose of this course is to introduce basic conception of pediatric physiological development, function and regulatory mechanisms in every system. Let students use physiologic knowledge to infant and child care in the future. The contents include cellular physiology, pediatric physiology of nervous system, skeletal and muscular system, cardiovascular system, respiratory system, gastrointestinal system, urinary system, and endocrine system.

Chinese Literature I

Pediatric Physiology
本課程以學生在高職學校學得之生物學知識為基礎，協助其更進一步瞭解人體生理學原理及探討比較幼兒生理功能之基本知識，並強調各器官系統間之調節機轉。內容包括細胞生理學、神經與肌肉生理學、循環生理學、呼吸生理學、消化道生理、腎臟生理學、代謝之調節、生殖生理及內分泌學。

This is a two-hour weekly and one-semester course which is worth two credits. This is an intermediate to high-intermediate level English course. The main contents of the course consist of: common English vocabulary in workplace, business English dialogue expressions, communication skills in workplace, and the application of communication skills. In this course, students are expected: (a) to become familiar with common English vocabulary in workplace, business English dialogue expressions, and communication skills; and (b) to apply common English vocabulary in workplace and business English dialogue expressions to their everyday English conversations.

Play enhances both physical and mental health of children and is the Way it learns. 01
Philosophy and Life
「哲學與人生」是對「人的生命」所作的「哲學反省」。人，作為自然的、社會的、歷史的存在，在他所生活的世界中，面臨著繁複多樣、瞬息萬變的問題：處境、命運、愛情、知識、道德、藝術、宗教、臨終與死亡……其中有些問題事實上已經深深困擾著我們，另外一些則伺機突襲，在我們還來不及準備的時候，就被迫面對。生命的意義究竟是什麼？本課程嘗試以深入淺出的討論，藉由過去、當代人物的所感、所思，促進學習者進一步反省自我生命之種種。
Philosophy and Life is as a philosophical reflective thinking for the life.
Human beings, as natural, social and historical beings, face a great many complex varied and fast changing problems in the life-world, for example, love, destiny, knowledge, morality, art, religion, dying, and moreover the death so on.... Actually some of them have deeply perplexed us, while others watch for their chances to attack there would leave no time for covering our ears and we are merely compelled to confront with them. After all, what does Life mean?
Whereas this course tries to take up by the way a kind of discussion in explaining the profound in simple terms, and in making use of whatever in history, or the present age somebody's feeling and thinking, in order to promote the students to question themselves more about, and reflect further on all sorts of life-self.
全18週

Professional Ethics are the moral commitments of a profession that involve moral reflection that extends and Teacher’s academic 0code:09460946 09466enhances the personal morality practitioners bring to their work, that concern actions of right and wrong in the workplace, and that help individuals resolve moral dilemmas they encounter in their work. Childhood is a 
unique and valuable stage in the human life cycle. Our paramount responsibility is to provide care and

live, play, and work cooperatively. 本課程旨在探討如何規畫與設計嬰幼兒的學習環境。課程內容著重於嬰幼兒托育機構之學習環境設計，除探討學習環境對嬰幼兒之潛在影響、學習環境設計之基本原理原則外，並著眼於嬰幼兒學習環境設計之實務，與各類型學習區之規畫與管理。學生於課堂中透過一系列的練習活動與實務演練，除練習設計嬰兒之教保環境外，並學習依照課程主題創造統整情境、規劃且佈置數個完整的學習區。
This course is aimed to explore how to create and design learning environments appropriate for infants and young children. It focuses on planning, arranging learning areas within indoor and outdoor spaces in preschool. Contents of this course include principles for the design of classrooms and other learning spaces, guidelines for the design and arrangement of learning centers, and observation and evaluation skills of learning centers. Students will explore, plan, arrange, and evaluate the design of various learning areas.
全18週

PE-Table Tennis3
此課程是先學習與養成良好的基本技術與接發球技術後
再加強雙打戰術理論與應用。學習「雙打戰術理論模式」就是以理論為基礎，以提升雙
打戰術觀念。而雙打注重的是技術與兩位球員搭配之默契並運用各種戰術以全面、快速、
變化之打法獲得有效之成果或在比賽中贏取勝利。
In this course, a player should learn and cultivate good basic skills and the 
skills in receiving and serving the ball first, and then reinforce the theory and 
applications of doubles tactics. To learn “the model of doubles tactics theory” 
is to enhance the concept of doubles tactics based on theories. In doubles, the 
skills and the unspoken consensus of cooperation between the two players 
are emphasized; also, various kinds of tactics are applied, so as to use 
comprehensive, rapid and variable playing skills to obtain effective results or 
triumph.

Teaching Materials and Methods for Young Children I
課程設計與教學能力係屬幼兒教保工作人員之專業能力，為提升教保品質之基本條件，不可或缺。衡量當今幼兒教育思潮、幼兒發展需求與社會發展狀況，本課程從統整理念出發，依據「幼兒園教保活動與課程大綱」（新課綱）之精神及內涵，幫助學生建立以幼兒為中心之幼兒教材教法觀念、培養學生實際進行幼兒教保活動之能力。主要內容包含瞭解幼兒園教學之理念與實務，認識新課綱身體動作與健康領域、語文領域、社會領域之課程目標與學習指標，以及各領域之教學內容與教學方法，包含學習區教學。學生應能根據課堂所學，設計教學活動並實施，之後進行檢討。
Course Description：

The purposes of this course are to explore the characteristics, contents, and trends of teaching methods and materials for preschoolers. Due to the limitation of course schedule, this course will focus on six major child development aspects. The contents focus both theories and practices in this topics. Students will also be able to design different lesson plans for children in its different development stages by using what they learned in this course.
全18週

Infant and Child Care Practicum II
實習之目的為促進學生了解教保機構之性質、組織狀況及業務內容，觀摩並學習實習機構專業工作者之角色與職責，以及藉由實習活動，印證演練幼兒保育專業知識與技能。

Last, through student teaching and related activities, students will consolidate their knowledge and skills regarding infant & child care.

Gender and Healthcare
本課程以性別主流化的概念為基礎，透過個體啟蒙、意識覺醒與行為實踐的過程，將引導學生論述於不同醫學專科領域之性別議題，且能辨識家庭、工作職場、社會福利和醫療環境中的性別平等政策。以期使學生能發展具有性別平等的概念，並應用於健康照護的情境中。
This course is based on the concept of gender mainstreaming. We hope that through the process of enlightenment, awareness and practice that could help student to understand the gender perspective in different area of medical specialties, and to identify the relation for gender concept among family, workplace, social welfare, and health policy. The student would develop the vision and ability of gender analysis, and take action with gender perspective which applies in nursing care.

Freshman English I
本課程為一學期兩小時兩學分的閱讀課程。教學重點為文法重點複習、閱讀技巧及練習、普通英文文章閱讀。於該課程中學生能熟練高初級至初中級(high beginning ~ low-intermediate level)基本文法重點，學習並運用各種英文閱讀技巧，閱讀並理解高初級至初中級(high beginning ~ low-intermediate level)普通英文文章。
This is a one-semester course which is worth two credits and includes a two-hour reading instruction each week. The main contents of the course consist of: grammar review, reading skills and practice, and general English text reading. In this course, students are expected to become familiar with English grammar (from high beginning ~ low-intermediate level), learn different reading skills, and apply the skills to their comprehension of English texts (from high beginning ~ low-intermediate level).

Students will thus know how to use the communication skills which they need to succeed in business or at office and will enlarge their knowledge of the business world. 

Students will develop essential communication skills such as making presentations, taking part in meetings, negotiating, telephoning, and using English in social situations. Students will become more confident in using English at the job market and increase their career prospects.

Human Development
本課程主要目的在探討人類自生命發生至終結整個過程中，各發展階段之重要現象、影響因素及後續反應。主要之理論架構包涵生理、心理、社會文化及靈性層面各種重要觀點，課程特別強調發展危機和任務及健康需求，期能使學習者獲得全面性之觀念與實務性之經驗探討，以增進學生具備了解「人」的基本知識與能力。
This course proposes students can understand a developmental process of human, and characteristics of individual's behavior patterns in each development stages. Then students can learn the strategies of prevention and adjustment for themselves. The development process of human starts from fertilization to death, that includes the beginning of life , infancy , toddler , childhood , adolescent , adulthood ,middle age , old age and death.

Chemistry
本課程旨在從基本之化學概念，引導學生進入自然科學之領域。由最簡單之物質概述“原子”闡述，漸序進入更大分子領域，進而對有關人體之各巨觀化學現象的了解。並以深入淺出之教學方法，並配合日後生物化學等相關課程，將著重於加強有機化學，分析化學等內容作更深入的探討。
Students of the biological sciences require a good grounding in chemistry if they are to fully 
understand key aspects of their courses.  The course is divided into 17 sections containing 59 topics. Each topic consists of a key notes panel with concise statements of the key points covered. These are expanded on in the main part of the topic which includes simple and clear black and white figures which many readily be reproduced for essays or examinations for example.

Psychology
本課程主要內容是以心理學各種基礎理論、研究方法及重要實驗為主，進而擴展應用於心理衛生各種人類生活適應行為及生活層面。課程綱要包括心理學的起源與發展、基礎理論與研究方法、行為的生物學基礎、意識狀態、感覺與知覺、學習與行為、記憶、思維與智力、心理評量:人格與智力測驗、人類發展、動機與情緒、人格、壓力與衝突、異常行為、心理治療方式、社會知覺與認知、態度、社會影響與互動。
The main content of this curriculum is to expand and apply the fundamental theory, research method, and important experiment in psychology to mental health in various living line includes the origin and development of psychology, fundamental theory and research method, fundamentals of behavioral biology, consciousness, sensation and perception, leaning, cognition, memory, thinking and intelligence, psychological assessment, personality and intelligence test, human development, motivation and emotion, personality stress and conflict, abnormal behavior psychotherapeutics social perception, cognition, attitude, and social influence and interaction.

History of Artistic Culture
透過藝術文化的類型與不同的表現形式及中西方藝術的演進與賞析，瞭解藝術的理念、內涵與歷史演變，深入探討藝術與生命、美感與生活、藝術與文化等重要議題之意義。培養學生對藝術文化有基本的認識與高度的敏感度，提升審美素養，持續自主學習的興趣。
Through the exploration of various types and form of art and culture, as well as the evolution and appreciation of Eastern and Western art, this course provides an understanding of the concepts, meaning and historical transformations of arts. 本課程為電腦之基礎課程，主要培育學生資訊素養，以具備適當資訊應用能力。課程內容除強化電腦基本概念、作業系統與文書處理軟體應用能力外，並包含網路觀念、網路應用、網路安全、資訊倫理，與智慧財產權。
This course is a basic course to educate students to have enough knowledge about information literacy and network application. The course will include the basic concept of computers, operating systems, office application software, network applications, information security, and intellectual property concepts.
全18週

01
History of Artistic Culture
透過藝術文化的類型與不同的表現形式及中西方藝術的演進與賞析，瞭解藝術的理念、內涵與歷史演變，深入探討藝術與生命、美感與生活、藝術與文化等重要議題之意義。培養學生對藝術文化有基本的認識與高度的敏感度，提升審美素養，持續自主學習的興趣。
Through the exploration of various types and form of art and culture, as well as the evolution and appreciation of Eastern and Western art, this course provides an understanding of the concepts, meaning and historical transformations of arts. It further delves deeply into significant topics such as art and life, aesthetics and everyday life, and art and culture. Students will acquire a foundational comprehension and heightened sensitivity of art and culture, enhance their aesthetic literacy, and foster a sustained commitment to self-directed education.

Caring and Communication
本課程旨在培養學生具備關懷與溝通的能力。課程內容包含了解關懷的內涵、引導學生從認識自己、關懷自我，延伸至關懷家人及關懷他人，並在人際互動中展現關懷與溝通的技巧與行為。
The aims of the course are to improve the self- awareness of the student, to nurture the competence of communication and caring. The course contents include the relationships among people to people, people to society, people to environment and spirit. Journalistic English
本課程為每學期兩學分。教學內容包括熟練新聞句法、新聞用字及新聞英語中文章的閱讀技巧及其應用，是突破中級程度進階至中高級或高級之最佳訓練課程，學生能聽懂新聞廣播、閱讀新聞報導及收看新聞節目。
This course includes two hours of instruction each week and is worth two credits. This course focuses on the application of different listening and reading strategies for comprehending the latest news, including those related to nursing and health sciences published in Times as well as at BBC, CNN, and New York Times websites. Students are expected to learn the information related to the news and become familiar with the vocabulary and sentence structures contained in the news. Students are also expected to participate in the following activities: discussing issues related to the news, giving presentations, and criticizing each piece of news as well as other peers’ presentation performances in the classroom. In addition, students also need to study the materials at http://140.131.85.13/enginfo/myABC/index.htm for NTUNHS Joint Exams.
全18週

01
Physical Examination and Practice
本課程旨在提供已具有解剖、生理、病理及心理學知識的學習者，學習身體評估之知識與技巧。課程目標在增進學生身體評估技術的正確性與完整性，進而培育學生關懷、溝通與合作的專業素養; 教學策略將針對不足之學理，進行澄清和討論，各項評估能力則利用角色扮演並藉由示教及分組練習，使學生能有系統的進行個案整體性的身體評估。課程內涵強調以人為本及整體觀，使學生能於設計的模擬情境中展現臨床決策、溝通能力、關懷與專業倫理，並應用於護理情境中。
This course is designed to provide students who already have knowledge of anatomy and physiology to learn the knowledge and skills of physical examination. The goal of the course is to improve the correctness and completeness of students' physical examination techniques, thereby develop students' professional qualities of care, communication, and cooperation. The teaching strategy will be to clarify and discuss deficiencies in academic theory, and to practice physical examination through role-play, demonstration, and group practice. Thereafter, students can systematically conduct a comprehensive physical examination of different cases. The content of the course emphasizes a person-centered and holistic view, enabling students to demonstrate clinical decision-making, communication skills, caring and professional ethics in designed simulated situations, and allow students to apply them in actual nursing situations.
全18週
